sentence.Network_en: A relationship should be a source of inspiration , invigoration and hope.
sentence.Network_cn: 恋爱必须是令人振奋、涌现希望、潮气的泉源.

sentence.Network_en: Reformation and opening to the outside world should Be accompanied with invigoration of the economy.
sentence.Network_cn: 改革开放,必须搞活经济.

sentence.Network_en: This product has great effect on invigoration of blood circulation and relief of pain.
sentence.Network_cn: 本品处方中以舒肝理气、散结镇痛药为主,有调经理血、散结消痛之作用.

means.word_mean: 1. quality of being active or spirited or alive and vigorous
2. the activity of giving vitality and vigour to something
